name: Magneton

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Selfdestruct
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to each Pokemon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Magneton does 80 damage to itself.

flavorText: Formed by several Magnemites linked together. It frequently appears when sunspots flare up.

strengths: Thunder Wave can lock opponents with Paralysis
Selfdestruct deals massive damage to active and bench
Can swing games with well-timed Selfdestruct
weaknesses: Only 60 HP is very fragile for a Stage 1
Selfdestruct KOs Magneton and damages your own bench
counters: High HP Pokemon - Can survive Selfdestruct

competitiveHistory: Magneton saw limited competitive play due to its fragile HP and the self-destructive nature of its signature attack. However, well-timed Selfdestructs could swing games, making it a situational but memorable card.

rulings.ruling: Selfdestruct damages all Benched Pokemon on both sides, but doesn't apply Weakness or Resistance to bench damage.
Magneton takes 80 damage from Selfdestruct, which will Knock it Out.
